      • getUserCommentOptions

        Returns the default sharing options for the user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The default sharing options for the user.

      • addComment

        public static void addComment(Activity context,
              Entity entity,
              String text,
              CommentAddListener listener)
        Adds a comment to the given entity. This method will also prompt the user to share their comment.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        entity - The entity on which the comment will be associated.
        text - The text of the comment.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • deleteComment

        public static void deleteComment(Activity context,
                 long id,
                 CommentDeleteListener listener)
        Deletes a comment. Only the person that created the comment can delete it.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        id - The ID of the comment to be deleted.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • addComment

        public static void addComment(Activity context,
              Entity entity,
              String text,
              CommentOptions commentOptions,
              CommentAddListener listener,
              SocialNetwork... networks)
        Adds a comment to the given entity. This method will NOT prompt the user to share their comment as the desired networks are passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        entity - The entity on which the comment will be associated.
        text - The text of the comment.
        commentOptions - Optional parameters for the comment.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.
        networks - 0 or more networks on which to share the comment. It is assumed that the user is already linked to the given networks. If not an error will be reported in the listener for each propagation failure.

      • getComment

        public static void getComment(Activity context,
              CommentGetListener listener,
              long id)
        Retrieves a single comment based on ID.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        id -
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • getComments

        public static void getComments(Activity context,
               CommentListListener listener,
               long... ids)
        Retrieves comments based on a set of IDs.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.
        ids - An array of comment IDs

      • getCommentsByUser

        public static void getCommentsByUser(Activity context,
                     User user,
                     int start,
                     int end,
                     CommentListListener listener)
        Retrieves all comments made by the given user.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        user - The user.
        start - The start index for pagination (from 0).
        end - The end index for pagination.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • getCommentsByEntity

        public static void getCommentsByEntity(Activity context,
                       String entityKey,
                       int start,
                       int end,
                       CommentListListener listener)
        Retrieves all comments associated with the given entity.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        entityKey - The entity on which the comment were associated.
        start - The start index for pagination (from 0).
        end - The end index for pagination.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • getCommentsByApplication

                            int start,
                            int end,
                            CommentListListener listener)
        Retrieves all comments across all entities.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        start - The start index for pagination (from 0).
        end - The end index for pagination.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.
